original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing /
translated: They give rise to the aspiration for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They again and again make aspirations for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yang dang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas /
analyzed: yang dang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas /
translated: Seeing these many sufferings of saṃsāra,

original: lha dang / mi dang; lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang; lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos /
translated: they aspire for the sake of the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: sman par mos /
analyzed: sman par mos /
translated: They aspire to be a doctor.

original: bde bar mos shing /
analyzed: bde bar mos shing /
translated: They aspire to happiness.

original: legs par bgyi bar mos te /
analyzed: legs par bgyi bar mos te /
translated: They aspire to do good.

original: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who have those kinds of aspirations think like this:

original: ci bdag rgal nas sems can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci bdag rgal nas sems can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram /
translated: ‘Will I, having crossed over, liberate beings who have not crossed over?

original: ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram; ci bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma byung ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram; ci bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma byung ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram /
translated: Will I, having been freed, free beings who have not been freed? Will I, having breathed, give beings who have not breathed a chance to breathe?

original: ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
analyzed: ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
translated: Will I, having attained complete nirvāṇa,

original: sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog ste /
translated: Do they lead to the complete nirvana of sentient beings who have not attained complete nirvana?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in this way, they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who have newly entered the vehicle, and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who have long practiced,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible, and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth.🔽 If they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,

original: de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su @67b yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su @67b yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by one birth,🔽 and they rejoice in the generation of the mind of the bodhisattva

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ci tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ci tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: How much would the merit of that son of a good family or that daughter of a good family increase?”🔽The Lord having said that, Śatakratu, head of the gods, inquired of him,🔽“Lord, it is like this:

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: It is possible that the measure of the great billionfold world system could be known by measuring it with the tip of an object the size of the tip of a hair split a hundred times,🔽but, Lord, it is not possible to measure the merit of the thought that has gone with rejoicing.”

original: koo shi ka /🔽gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis /
translated: “Kauśika,”

original: tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
translated: the Lord said, “it is possible that the measure of a world system of a thousand worlds or a world system of a million worlds or a world system of a billion worlds could be known by measuring it with the tip of an object the size of the tip of a hair split a hundred times,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but, Kauśika, it is not possible to measure the merit of the thought that has gone with rejoicing.”

original: koo shi ka /🔽stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis /
analyzed: koo shi ka / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis /
translated: “Kauśika,”

original: tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
translated: the Lord said, “it is possible that the measure of a world system of a thousand worlds or a world system of a million worlds or a world system of a billion worlds could be known by measuring it with the tip of an object the size of the tip of a hair split a hundred times,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but, Kauśika, it is not possible to measure the merit of the thought that has gone with rejoicing.”

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,”🔽the Lord said, “it is possible that the measure of a world system of a thousand worlds or a world system of a million worlds or a world system of a billion worlds could be known by measuring it with the tip of an object the size of the tip of a hair split a hundred times,🔽but, Kauśika, it is not possible to measure the merit of the thought that has gone with rejoicing.”

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni /🔽skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha gcig gis /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni / skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha gcig gis /
translated: The water in the great oceans of the three-thousand great thousandfold world system

original: chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad kyis tshad dag gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /🔽de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan @68a *//
analyzed: chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad kyis tshad dag gzung bar rung yang srid kyi / de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan @68a *//
translated: can be measured by taking a drop of water with a tip of hair split a hundred times,

original: pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but it is not possible to measure the merit of the generation of the thought accompanied by rejoicing in those.🔽The Lord having said that,

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
translated: Śakra, Lord of the Gods,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: said this to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: those sentient beings who do not rejoice in those generations of the thought are empowered by Māra.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur ba'o //
translated: Those sentient beings who do not rejoice in the generation of the thought of enlightenment are on the side of Māra.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa'o //
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa'o //
translated: those sentient beings who do not rejoice in the generation of the thought of enlightenment have died in the abode of Māra.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang gi sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang gi sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste /
translated: Blessed One,🔽those sentient beings who have accomplished the generation of the thought of enlightenment🔽and who dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening destroy the abode of Māra.

original: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskyed pa'i sems de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskyed pa'i sems de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste /
translated: Those who generate the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should rejoice in it.

original: gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs sum ma btang pa de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs sum ma btang pa de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
translated: Those who have not abandoned the Buddha, have not abandoned the Dharma, and have not abandoned the Saṅgha should rejoice in those thoughts.

original: rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi ste /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi ste /
translated: Having rejoiced, they should dedicate [the merit] to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ji ltar gnyis @68b kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gnyis @68b kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
translated: They should dedicate [the merit] in such a way that there is no dualistic perception, and also no perception of non-duality.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de de bzhin no /
analyzed: de de bzhin no /
translated: it is so,🔽it is just as you have said.🔽Kauśika,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so,

original: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no //
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag ni myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag ni myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: Those who rejoice in these arousals of Awakening Mind will quickly please the Thus-Gone Ones, the Worthy Ones, the Perfect Buddhas.

original: mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And having pleased them, they will not displease them.

original: de ltar de dag rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni /
analyzed: de ltar de dag rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni /
translated: Thus, those who have these roots of virtue connected with the arousals of mind that rejoice in this way

original: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu rim gror bya bar 'gyur ro //🔽bkur stir bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu rim gror bya bar 'gyur ro // bkur stir bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will be honored wherever they are born.🔽They will be revered.

original: bsti stang du bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsti stang du bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be respected.

original: mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be worshipped.

original: des nam yang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des nam yang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never see an unpleasant form.

original: nam yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never hear an unpleasant sound.

original: nam yang dri yid du mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur ro; ;nam yang ro yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang dri yid du mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur ro; ;nam yang ro yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never smell an unpleasant smell.🔽He will never experience an unpleasant taste.

original: nam yang reg yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang reg yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never feel an unpleasant touch.

original: nam yang chos yid du mi 'ong ba shes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang chos yid du mi 'ong ba shes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never cognize an unpleasant mental object.

original: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He will never be separated from the blessed buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
translated: and he will go from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa @69a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa @69a *//
translated: He will serve and venerate those blessed buddhas

original: dang; dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang; dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and plant the roots of virtue.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /🔽tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa / tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas /

original: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ci nas kyang sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ci nas kyang sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /
translated: For this reason, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family should rejoice in the wholesome roots of the bodhisatva great beings who have newly set out in the vehicle, without mind and without another non-mind.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: They should dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang @69b bar byas shing /
analyzed: sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang @69b bar byas shing /
translated: They should rejoice in the wholesome roots of those who practice, of those irreversible, and of those obstructed by one birth, without mind and without another non-mind.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: They should dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:🔽“Lord, if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family should rejoice in the wholesome roots of the bodhisatvas who have newly set out in the vehicle, without mind and without another non-mind,🔽and should dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽how should they rejoice and how should they dedicate?”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: how can a mind that is like an illusion fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Subhūti,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: Do you see that mind that is like an illusion?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni ma lags te /
translated: I do not.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis sgyu ma'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis sgyu ma'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One,🔽I do not see even an illusion,

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: and I do not see that mind that is like an illusion.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / de ni ji snyam du sems /🔽de ltar sgyu ma'ang ma mthong /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni ji snyam du sems / de ltar sgyu ma'ang ma mthong /
translated: what do you think?🔽If you do not see an illusion

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang ma mthong na /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang ma mthong na /
translated: and you do not see a mind that is like an illusion,

original: sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: Do you see that thought which will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, Bhagavan,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: I do not.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavan said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /🔽sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes @70a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems / sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes @70a *//
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: su mthong ngam /
analyzed: su mthong ngam /
translated: Do you see a phenomenon other than an illusion and an illusory thought that will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, Bhagavan,

original: de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni ma lags te /
translated: I do not.

original: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not see any phenomenon that is other than an illusion or an illusory mind that fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
translated: since I do not see any other phenomenon,

original: mchis pa'am ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: mchis pa'am ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi /
translated: what existent or nonexistent phenomenon should I teach?

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am ma mchis par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am ma mchis par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: A phenomenon that is utterly isolated does not become existent or nonexistent.

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: A phenomenon that is utterly isolated does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ma mchis pa'i chos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: ma mchis pa'i chos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: A nonexistent phenomenon does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because all phenomena are nonexistent and do not exist in such a way that they could be afflicted

original: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing yongs su ma mchis pa'o //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing yongs su ma mchis pa'o // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: or purified.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o; ;bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o; ;bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is utterly void, the perfection of meditative stability is utterly void,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of perseverance is utterly void,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of patience is utterly void,

original: tshul @70b khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshul @70b khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of ethical discipline is utterly void,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o // nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: and the perfection of generosity is utterly void.🔽Inner emptiness is utterly void,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is utterly void.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are extremely isolated.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and the noble eightfold path are extremely isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble truths, meditative stabilizations, immeasurable thoughts, and formless absorptions are extremely isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The liberations, serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are extremely isolated.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The clairvoyances, meditative stabilizations, and dhāraṇī gateways are extremely isolated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are void.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Up to the knowledge of all aspects is void.

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags /
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags /
translated: Any dharma that is void is not something to be cultivated.

original: rnam par bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags @71a *//
analyzed: rnam par bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags @71a *//
translated: It is not something to be fully cultivated.

original: te; de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang bsgrub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: te; de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang bsgrub pa ma mchis so //
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom is void, it does not establish any dharma.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na /
translated: “The perfection of wisdom is void.

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is relied on?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na /
translated: If unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is also utterly isolated,

original: ji ltar dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: how will the isolated awaken to the isolated?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / legs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / legs so //
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, excellent, excellent!

original: legs so // rab 'byor /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: legs so // rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so, it is so.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is utterly isolated.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving are utterly isolated.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: “Inner emptiness is extremely isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is extremely isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni @71b shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni @71b shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness, right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path are extremely isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble truths, concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions are extremely isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The liberations, serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are extremely isolated.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang; snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang; snying rje chen po dang /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are extremely isolated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Up to and the knowledge of all aspects is extremely isolated.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Subhūti, just as the perfection of wisdom is extremely isolated, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality,🔽and the perfection of giving are extremely isolated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: inner emptiness is utterly isolated, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is utterly isolated, the applications of mindfulness are utterly isolated,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de bzhin du @72a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de bzhin du @72a *//
translated: up to the noble eightfold path is utterly isolated, and up to the knowledge of all aspects is utterly isolated,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: in the same way, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is utterly isolated.

original: rab 'byor / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: Subhūti, if the perfection of wisdom were not utterly isolated,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of moral discipline, and the transcendent perfection of generosity are not isolated;

original: nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: inner emptiness is not isolated;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not isolated;

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not isolated;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: up to the noble eightfold path is not isolated;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur na /
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is not isolated;

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not the transcendent perfection of wisdom.”🔽“Lord, if the transcendent perfection of wisdom is not isolated,

original: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, or the perfection of generosity.

original: de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: up to it would not be the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be the applications of mindfulness,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: up to it would not be the noble eightfold path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na ji ltar @72b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na ji ltar @72b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Therefore, Subhuti, just as the perfection of wisdom is quite secluded, just as the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang; ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang; ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving are quite secluded, just as inner emptiness is quite secluded, up to just as the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is quite secluded, just as the applications of mindfulness are quite secluded,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang /
translated: without having recourse to the perfection of wisdom,

original: bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //🔽dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na /
analyzed: bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o // dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na /
translated: they will not fully know the supreme enlightenment.🔽The void does not fully know the supreme enlightenment,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: and without having recourse to the perfection of wisdom they will not fully know the supreme enlightenment.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhuti : Deep, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord : The Bodhisattva, the great being, courses in the deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord : So it is, Subhuti.

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just so,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva practices the profound meaning.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar @73a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar @73a *//
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva,

original: don zab mo la spyod cing /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: don zab mo la spyod cing / 'di lta ste /
translated: practicing the profound meaning in that way,🔽does not actualize that meaning,

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: namely, the level of the śrāvakas🔽or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
translated: This is the difficult practice.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na dka' ba cung zad kyang mi bgyid na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags so //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na dka' ba cung zad kyang mi bgyid na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags so //
translated: He said, “Blessed One, according to my understanding of what the Blessed One has said, he does not do anything difficult at all. How is it that the bodhisattva mahāsattva does something difficult?

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang mi dmigs /
translated: it is because he does not apprehend that meaning which is to be actualized.

original: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend the perfection of wisdom by which it is to be actualized.

original: gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te /
translated: That Dharma which is to be realized is also not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: chos thams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: what is that meaning which is to be realized, by realizing which one will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom that is to be realized?

original: chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: What is that Dharma which is to be realized?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste /
translated: this is the practice of non-apprehension.

original: de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices it attains the absence of darkness with regard to all dharmas.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gal te de skad du bstan pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gal te de skad du bstan pa la /
translated: Blessed One,🔽if the bodhisattva mahāsattva's mind does not become discouraged

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum /🔽yongs su mi 'jum zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum / yongs su mi 'jum zhing /
translated: when taught in this way,🔽does not become cowed,🔽is not frightened,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs /
translated: is not terrified,

original: skrag par mi 'gyur @73b na; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: skrag par mi 'gyur @73b na; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who practices in this way practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see ‘I am practicing.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘I will distance myself from the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels,

original: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam yang mi bgyid do //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam yang mi bgyid do //
translated: and I will approach the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo //
translated: it is like this:🔽for example, space does not think, ‘I am far from this,

original: la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: or near to this.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing mi g-yo ba dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing mi g-yo ba dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because space is without distinctions, is unmoving, and is without conceptualization.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi /
translated: in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not think, ‘The śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level is far from me,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: but unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi @74a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi @74a *//
translated: Blessed One,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo /
translated: For example, a conjured person does not think, ‘This conjuring trick is far from me,

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o //
translated: but the magician is near.

original: skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am /
translated: This crowd of people is far from me,

original: nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: but the magician is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /
translated: because a conjured person is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
translated: in the same way, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘The levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas are far from me,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: but unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.🔽’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de ni nye /
analyzed: dper na / gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de ni nye /
translated: For example, a reflection does not think, ‘The object from which it arises is near,

original: gang me long dang / snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: gang me long dang / snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: and that which arises in a mirror or a vessel full of water is far from me.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: gzugs brnyan rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because a reflection is non-conceptual.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag @74b las nyan thos sam /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is non-conceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa ma mchis so //
translated: in the perfection of wisdom there is nothing that is pleasant or unpleasant.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'di la sdug pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'di la sdug pa'am /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
translated: It is because the essential nature of that which would be pleasant or unpleasant here is not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa'am /
translated: it is like this:

original: mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: for the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha there is nothing that is pleasant or unpleasant.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa'am /
translated: Blessed One,

original: mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: in the same way, in the perfection of wisdom there is nothing that is pleasant or unpleasant.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
translated: for the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha all conceptual thoughts have been abandoned.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba yang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba yang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings training in the perfection of wisdom have abandoned all conceptualization.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'di @75a *//
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'di @75a *//
translated: for example, a tathāgata emanation does not think,

original: ltar nga las nyan thos sam /
analyzed: ltar nga las nyan thos sam /
translated: ‘the śrāvaka level or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
translated: the pratyekabuddha level is far from me,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi dgongs so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi dgongs so //
translated: but unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because the tathāgata and the tathāgata emanation are nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not think, ‘The śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level is far away from me.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: Unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul pa mdzad na /
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul pa mdzad na /
translated: for example, the Tathāgata emanates an emanation.

original: de ni don gang gi slad du sprul pa'i don de sbyor te /
analyzed: de ni don gang gi slad du sprul pa'i don de sbyor te /
translated: It performs the function for which it was emanated.

original: sprul pa ni mi rtog /
analyzed: sprul pa ni mi rtog /
translated: The emanation does not think,

original: rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: it does not conceptualize.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de'ang bgyid pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de'ang bgyid pa /
translated: in the same way, the perfection of wisdom performs the function for which it is expressed.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi rtog /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi rtog /
translated: That perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: It is non-discriminating.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / shing mkhan nam /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / shing mkhan nam /
translated: it is like this:

original: shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam /🔽skyes pa'i gzugs sam /
analyzed: shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam / skyes pa'i gzugs sam /
translated: For example, a carpenter or a carpenter’s skilled apprentice might construct a mechanical doll🔽in the form of a woman,

original: glang po'i gzugs sam /🔽rta'i @75b gzugs sam /
analyzed: glang po'i gzugs sam / rta'i @75b gzugs sam /
translated: in the form of a man,🔽in the form of an elephant,🔽in the form of a horse,

original: glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar na /
analyzed: glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar na /
translated: or in the form of an ox.

original: de don gang gi slad du bgyid pa'i don de bsgrub kyang /
analyzed: de don gang gi slad du bgyid pa'i don de bsgrub kyang /
translated: Even though that doll accomplishes the purpose for which it was made,

original: 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: that doll is non-discriminating.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang /
translated: in the same way, even though the perfection of wisdom accomplishes the purpose for which it is taught,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: that perfection of wisdom is non-discriminating.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus; tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus; tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the venerable Subhūti,🔽“Venerable Subhūti, what is the purpose for which the perfection of wisdom is taught?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: The venerable Subhūti🔽said, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: is only the perfection of wisdom nonconceptual,

original: 'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /
translated: or are the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity also nonconceptual?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is also nonconceptual,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are also nonconceptual.”🔽Śāriputra asked,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: “Is form also nonconceptual?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang; rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang; rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness also nonconceptual?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang @76a *//
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang @76a *//
translated: Are the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination also nonconceptual?

original: rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the perfections also nonconceptual?

original: stong pa nyid thams cad du'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad du'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are all the emptinesses also nonconceptual?

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment also nonconceptual?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam; rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam; rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: Are the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions also nonconceptual? Are the liberations, the dhyānas, the samādhis, and the samāpattis also nonconceptual?

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness also nonconceptual?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the superknowledges, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways also nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha also nonconceptual?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are up to and including omniscience also nonconceptual?

original: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the compounded element and the uncompounded element also nonconceptual?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: all phenomena are nonconceptual.”🔽Śāradvatīputra then asked,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa yin na /
translated: If all phenomena are nonconceptual,

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye @76b gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba ci las 'ongs /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye @76b gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba ci las 'ongs /
