analyzed: de dag @115b tu chung ngu na sems can 'ga' tsam yang skyabs su 'gro ba'am / bslab pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya'o // bzod pa'am rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand quintillion leagues,🔽or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand quintillion leagues,🔽or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand quintillion leagues,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand quintillion leagues,🔽or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand quintillion leagues,🔽or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand quintillion leagues,🔽or a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand times a

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /🔽rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam / rang byang chub bam /
translated: to the state of a worthy one,🔽to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhag par bya'o zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhag par bya'o zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
translated: or to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: They make those wholesome roots into something shared in common by all sentient beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: and they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take up the perfection of perseverance.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti asked him,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Lord, how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: take up the perfection of concentration?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, standing in the perfection of patience,

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa las dben pa; sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa las dben pa; sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: like this, isolated from sense desires, isolated from sinful, nonvirtuous dharmas,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with applied thought and sustained thought,🔽with the joy and pleasure born of isolation,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar @116a *//🔽bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar @116a *// bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: make an effort and remain in the first concentration.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They make an effort and remain in the second concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They make an effort and remain in the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They make an effort and remain in the fourth concentration.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They make an effort and remain in the absorption of the cessation of discriminations and feelings.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gang dang gang skyes pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gang dang gang skyes pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Whatever wholesome dharmas arise, together with the wholesome roots, they all dedicate to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci nas kyang de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ci nas kyang de'i tshe /
translated: How is it that at that time

original: bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: he dedicates so that the meditative stabilities and the branches of the meditative stabilities are not apprehended?

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take hold of the perfection of concentration.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: take hold of the perfection of wisdom?”🔽The Lord said, “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing; gang gi tshe chos rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing; gang gi tshe chos rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa'am /
translated: when they see form, see it as isolated,

original: zhi ba'i rnam pa'am /
analyzed: zhi ba'i rnam pa'am /
translated: see it as calm,

original: mi zad pa'i rnam par chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang snying po byang chub la nam 'dug gi @116b bar du chos nyid de mngon du mi byed de /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i rnam par chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang snying po byang chub la nam 'dug gi @116b bar du chos nyid de mngon du mi byed de /
translated: Although they abide in the observation of the inexhaustible Dharma, they do not actualize that reality until they are seated at the Focal Point of Awakening.

original: snying po byang chub la 'dug nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: snying po byang chub la 'dug nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: And when they are seated at the Focal Point of Awakening, they attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de las langs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor te /🔽rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: de las langs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor te / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: And when they rise from that, they turn the wheel of Dharma.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin te /🔽ci nas kyang mi spong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin te / ci nas kyang mi spong /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience incorporate the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'dzin pa de ltar yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa de ltar yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: They incorporate it in such a way that they neither reject nor grasp at anything.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: The Lord said,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance incorporate the perfection of giving?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, standing in the perfection of perseverance,

original: lus dang sems kyis brtson pa mi 'dor ba yin te /
analyzed: lus dang sems kyis brtson pa mi 'dor ba yin te /
translated: do not abandon perseverance in body and mind.

original: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'i /
analyzed: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'i /
translated: ‘I must not fail to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽I must without doubt fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de sems can rnams kyi don du dpag tshad dam /
analyzed: bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de sems can rnams kyi don du dpag tshad dam /
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, they go to a distance of one league,

original: dpag tshad brgya'am /🔽dpag tshad stong ngam /
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya'am / dpag tshad stong ngam /
translated: or a hundred leagues,🔽or a thousand leagues,

original: dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam /
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam /
translated: or a hundred thousand leagues,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams sam /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams sam /
translated: or a world system,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya @117a *//🔽phrag stong gi bar dag tu song zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya @117a *//🔽phrag stong gi bar dag tu song zhing /
translated: or up to a hundred thousand quintillion world systems,🔽and

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: Abiding in the perfection of effort,🔽they establish at least some sentient beings in enlightenment.

original: chung du na sems can 'ga' tsam yang byang chub la rab tu 'jog go ;gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang ma phrad na'ang /
analyzed: chung du na sems can 'ga' tsam yang byang chub la rab tu 'jog go ;gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang ma phrad na'ang /
translated: Even if they do not meet with a person who is a follower of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,

original: de dag tu gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: de dag tu gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: in those places they establish a person who is a follower of the vehicle of the hearers on the level of the hearers,

original: gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu gzhog ste /
analyzed: gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu gzhog ste /
translated: and they establish a person who is a follower of the vehicle of the solitary buddhas on the level of the solitary buddhas.

original: chung du na sems can 'ga' tsam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: chung du na sems can 'ga' tsam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: At the very least, they establish some sentient beings in the ten virtuous actions.

original: des chos kyi sbyin pa de dag byin nas zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed de /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: des chos kyi sbyin pa de dag byin nas zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed de / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Having given that gift of Dharma, they satisfy sentient beings with the gift of material things.🔽They do not dedicate that wholesome root to the level of the hearers

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
translated: or to the level of the solitary buddhas.

original: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: Rather, they make it common to all sentient beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: and dedicates them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take hold of the perfection of giving.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti asked him,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Lord, how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: take hold of the perfection of morality?🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / @117b 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @117b 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings starting from the first production of the thought,

original: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin; gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
analyzed: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin; gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
translated: I have given up killing and will continue to do so until I sit on the seat of awakening. I encourage others to give up killing,

original: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: and I speak in praise of giving up killing.

original: gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin no //🔽bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin no // bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin /
translated: I speak in praise of those who have given up killing, and I rejoice in them.

original: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
translated: I have given up stealing and will continue to do so until I sit on the seat of awakening. I encourage others to give up stealing,

original: ma byin pa len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: ma byin pa len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: and I speak in praise of giving up stealing.🔽I speak in praise of those who have given up stealing, and I rejoice in them.

original: gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin; bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin; bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa yin /
translated: I have given up sexual misconduct and will continue to do so until I sit on the seat of awakening. I encourage others to give up sexual misconduct,🔽and I speak in praise of giving up sexual misconduct.🔽I speak in praise of those who have given up sexual misconduct, and I rejoice in them.

analyzed: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te /
translated: They speak in praise of others who have given up wrong views and they rejoice in them.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed /
translated: Through this perfection of morality, they do not remain in the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams su gnas par mi byed /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su gnas par mi byed /
translated: they do not remain in the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed /
translated: they do not remain in the formless realm,

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: they do not remain in the śrāvaka level,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi byed de /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi byed de /
translated: and they do not remain in the pratyekabuddha level.

original: gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: Instead, they make those roots of virtue common to all sentient beings and dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ci nas kyang gang yongs su bsngo ba dang / ci yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang gang yongs su bsngo ba dang / ci yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate them in such a way that the three thoughts—that there is something to dedicate, that there is a dedication, and that there is something to which to dedicate—do not occur.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being, standing in the perfection of perseverance,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: embraces the perfection of morality.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar @119a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar @119a *//
translated: “Lord,

original: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings, standing in the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: embrace the perfection of patience?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /🔽snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mir gyur pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste / snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mir gyur pa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, starting from the first production of the thought of awakening,🔽up to sitting on the seat of awakening,

original: mi ma yin par gyur pas /
analyzed: mi ma yin par gyur pas /
translated: whether as a human or a nonhuman,

original: sems rnam par 'khrug par byas pa'am /
analyzed: sems rnam par 'khrug par byas pa'am /
translated: have their minds disturbed

original: yag lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs shing khyer te dong yang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du bdag las ci zhig bcad do //🔽bdag las ci zhig gtubs so //
analyzed: yag lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs shing khyer te dong yang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du bdag las ci zhig bcad do // bdag las ci zhig gtubs so //
translated: Even if they were to cut off and carry away all his major and minor body parts, the bodhisattva great being who is established in the perfection of perseverance would not think, “What have they cut off from me?🔽What have they cut up?

original: bdag las ci zhig khyer ro zhes bya bar mi sems te /
analyzed: bdag las ci zhig khyer ro zhes bya bar mi sems te /
translated: What have they carried away from me?”

original: gzhan du na de 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gi lus yongs su bsgrubs pa de dag 'dir 'ong zhing yan lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs nas khyer zhing 'dong ba ni bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo snyam mo //
analyzed: gzhan du na de 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gi lus yongs su bsgrubs pa de dag 'dir 'ong zhing yan lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs nas khyer zhing 'dong ba ni bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo snyam mo //
translated: Instead, he would think, “It is a gain for me, it is a great gain for me that those who have come here to cut off, cut up, and carry away my major and minor body parts should do so.”

original: des ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yid la byas pa yin te /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: des ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yid la byas pa yin te / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: He would also properly bring to mind the nature of phenomena,🔽and he would not dedicate those wholesome roots to the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
translated: or to the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: Otherwise, you should dedicate it to all sentient beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par @119b rdzegs  pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par @119b rdzegs  pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: and he dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take hold of the perfection of patience.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti asked him, “Lord,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance take hold of the perfection of concentration?🔽”

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, separated from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: separated from evil nonvirtuous dharmas,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with thought and reflection,🔽with the joy and happiness born of separation,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He dwells having attained the first concentration, which is accompanied by investigation and sustained thought, and is filled with joy and bliss born of seclusion.🔽With the calming of investigation and sustained thought, he dwells having attained the second concentration, which is filled with the joy and bliss born of meditative stabilization, and is without investigation and sustained thought.🔽With the fading away of joy, he dwells having attained the third concentration, which is filled with bliss, and is endowed with equanimity and mindfulness.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: With the abandonment of bliss, he dwells having attained the fourth concentration, which is filled with neither-unhappy-nor-happy feelings, and is endowed with pure mindfulness.

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur bas rtog pa med pa /🔽dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur bas rtog pa med pa / dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He dwells having attained the sphere of infinite space, which is beyond the sphere of infinite consciousness.🔽He dwells having attained the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception, which is beyond the sphere of nothingness.🔽He dwells having attained the cessation of perception and feeling, which is beyond the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.🔽“He dwells having attained the first concentration, which is accompanied by investigation and sustained thought, and is filled with joy and bliss born of seclusion.”

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /🔽bde ba lus kyis myong la /🔽'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /🔽bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te / bde ba lus kyis myong la / 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa / bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: “He dwells having attained the second concentration, which is filled with the joy and bliss born of meditative stabilization, and is without investigation and sustained thought.”🔽“He dwells having attained the third concentration, which is filled with bliss, and is endowed with equanimity and mindfulness.”🔽“He dwells having attained the fourth concentration, which is filled with neither-unhappy-nor-happy feelings, and is endowed with pure mindfulness.”

original: dga' @120a *// ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: dga' @120a *// ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “He dwells having attained the sphere of infinite space, which is beyond the sphere of infinite consciousness.”🔽“He dwells having attained the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception, which is beyond the sphere of nothingness.”🔽“He dwells having attained the cessation of perception and feeling, which is beyond the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.”

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang spongs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang spongs shing /
translated: He also abandons suffering.

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
translated: Since he has previously abandoned both mental pleasure and mental pain,

original: bde ba'ang med /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med /
translated: he also abandons pleasure.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He also abandons suffering. He accomplishes and dwells in the fourth concentration, which is purified of both pleasure and pain, and purified of both mental input and mental output, and is endowed with equanimity and mindfulness.

original: de sems can rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de sems can rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He accomplishes and dwells in immeasurable love, bringing to mind the notion of happiness for all sentient beings.

original: de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He accomplishes and dwells in immeasurable compassion, bringing to mind the notion of being free from suffering for all sentient beings.

original: de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He accomplishes and dwells in immeasurable joy, bringing to mind the notion of delight for all sentient beings.

original: de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang bde ba med pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de gzugs la che long du 'du shes shing /
analyzed: de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang bde ba med pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de gzugs la che long du 'du shes shing /
translated: They practice and abide in immeasurable equanimity, keeping in mind the idea that sentient beings have neither suffering nor happiness.

original: nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de nam mkha' la che long du 'du shes shing /
analyzed: nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de nam mkha' la che long du 'du shes shing /
translated: They practice and abide in the sphere of infinite space, keeping in mind the idea that space is expansive and that forms are peaceful.

original: rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de @120b rnam par shes pa la che long du 'du shes shing /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de @120b rnam par shes pa la che long du 'du shes shing /
translated: They practice and abide in the sphere of infinite consciousness, keeping in mind the idea that space is expansive and that consciousness is peaceful.

original: cung zad med pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de cung zad med pa la che long du 'du shes pas /
analyzed: cung zad med pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de cung zad med pa la che long du 'du shes pas /
translated: They practice and abide in the sphere of nothing whatsoever, keeping in mind the idea that consciousness is expansive and that nothing whatsoever is peaceful.🔽They practice and abide in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, keeping in mind the idea that nothing whatsoever is expansive and that neither perception nor non-perception is peaceful.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so; ;de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi len te /🔽gzhan du na sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir de dag tu skye zhing sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so; ;de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi len te / gzhan du na sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir de dag tu skye zhing sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: He does not appropriate the evolutionary development of those meditative concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions.🔽Rather, he is reborn in those states for the sake of those sentient beings, and he brings them to evolutionary maturity in the six perfections: in the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, the perfection of tolerance, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
translated: For the sake of generating the roots of virtue, they serve the lord buddhas and go from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take hold of the perfection of concentration.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar @121a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar @121a *//
translated: The Lord Buddha said,

original: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: take hold of the perfection of wisdom.🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord Buddha said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of perseverance

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang /
translated: They do not see the perfection of generosity as a thing, a substance, or a sign.

original: rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽nang stong pa nyid dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / nang stong pa nyid dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom as a thing, a substance, or a sign.🔽They do not see inner emptiness as a thing, a substance, or a sign.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature as a thing, a substance, or a sign.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the applications of mindfulness as a thing, a substance, or a sign.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par @121b rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par @121b rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not consider the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, or noble eightfold path to be things, substances, or signs.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the noble truths, concentrations, immeasurables, or formless absorptions to be things, substances, or signs.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not consider the eight deliverances, nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, or wishlessness to be things, substances, or signs.🔽They do not consider the ten powers of the tathāgatas, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, or eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha to be things, substances, or signs.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as things, substances, or signs.🔽They do not see the knowledge of all aspects as a thing, a substance, or a sign.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste; chos thams cad dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas chos gang la'ang gnas mi 'cha' zhing de ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste; chos thams cad dngos po dang / rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas chos gang la'ang gnas mi 'cha' zhing de ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa yin te /
translated: They do not settle down on any dharma at all, and they do what they say they will do.”🔽“

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being, standing in the perfection of perseverance,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: embraces the perfection of wisdom.

original: gsol @122a *// pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol @122a *// pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings, standing in the perfection of concentration,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: embrace the perfection of giving?”

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, isolated from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dpen pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dpen pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: isolated from evil nonvirtuous dharmas,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with thought and reflection,🔽with the joy and happiness born of isolation,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so //
translated: establish and dwell in the first concentration.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: he attains the second meditative concentration, which is free from conceptualization and analysis, and is inwardly pure,

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /🔽dpyod pa med pa /🔽ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa / dpyod pa med pa / ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: with a mind that is unified and immersed in samādhi,🔽experiencing joy and happiness.

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /🔽shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
translated: “Free from attachment to joy,

original: bde ba lus kyis myong la /
analyzed: bde ba lus kyis myong la /
translated: he abides with mindfulness and introspection, experiencing physical well-being.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /🔽bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa / bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: The noble ones declare:🔽‘He abides in equanimity, mindfully and with introspection, experiencing physical well-being.’

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “He attains the third meditative concentration, which is without joy.

original: sdug bsngal pa'ang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal pa'ang spangs shing /
translated: He has given up pleasure and given up pain,

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas @122b kyang nub pas /🔽bde ba'ang med /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas @122b kyang nub pas /🔽bde ba'ang med /
translated: and so with the disappearance of mental well-being and woe,🔽he abides in the fourth meditative concentration, which is a state of neither pleasure nor pain, and is completely purified in terms of equanimity and mindfulness.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag ba bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag ba bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He dwells in the fourth meditation, which is purified of happiness and suffering, purified of sadness and joy, and is endowed with neither suffering nor happiness, and is endowed with equanimity and mindfulness.

original: de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la'ang de bzhin du nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la'ang de bzhin du nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: In the same way, he dwells in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas mi g-yeng ba'i yid kyis /
analyzed: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas mi g-yeng ba'i yid kyis /
translated: Dwelling in this perfection of meditation, with a mind that is not distracted,

original: sems can de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: sems can de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: he gives material gifts and the gift of the teaching to those sentient beings, and he also encourages others to give material gifts and the gift of the teaching.

original: zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs pa'ang brjod do //
analyzed: zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs pa'ang brjod do //
translated: He speaks in praise of giving material gifts and the gift of the teaching,

original: gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa'ang brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa'ang brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te /
translated: and he also speaks in praise of others giving material gifts and the gift of the teaching, welcoming it again and again.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and he does not dedicate those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level,

original: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: but rather, having made them into something shared in common by all beings,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: he dedicates them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take hold of the perfection of giving.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @123a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @123a *//
translated: “Lord, how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: take hold of the perfection of morality?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, here the bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration🔽do not take up the morality of the śrāvakas or the morality of the pratyekabuddhas,🔽but rather, having made it into something shared in common by all beings,🔽they dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: sems 'dod chags dang ldan pa mi skyed /
analyzed: sems 'dod chags dang ldan pa mi skyed /
translated: do not produce a mind endowed with desire,🔽do not produce a mind endowed with anger,

original: sems zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / 'tshe ba dang ldan pa mi skyed de /
analyzed: sems zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / 'tshe ba dang ldan pa mi skyed de /
translated: do not produce a mind endowed with delusion, and do not produce a mind endowed with harmfulness.

original: gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Otherwise, they practice with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.🔽They do not dedicate those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level.

original: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: Otherwise, they make them common to all beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: and dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: they appropriate the perfection of morality.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration appropriate the perfection of patience?”

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: gzugs la dbu ba lta bur @123b rab tu rtog /
analyzed: gzugs la dbu ba lta bur @123b rab tu rtog /
translated: consider form to be like foam,

original: tshor ba la chu bur lta bu dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bu dang / 'du byed la chu shing lta bu dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog ste /🔽de de ltar len pa'i phung po lnga la so sor rtog cing /
analyzed: tshor ba la chu bur lta bu dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bu dang / 'du byed la chu shing lta bu dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog ste / de de ltar len pa'i phung po lnga la so sor rtog cing /
translated: consider feeling to be like a water bubble, consider perception to be like a mirage, consider volitional factors to be like a plantain tree, and consider consciousness to be like an illusion.

original: snying po med par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: snying po med par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: They thus discern the five appropriated aggregates and the perception of their corelessness is present.

original: de de ltar so sor rtog pas de 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: de de ltar so sor rtog pas de 'di snyam ste /
translated: When he investigates in this way, he thinks:

original: yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtubs kyang su la gcod su la bcad /
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtubs kyang su la gcod su la bcad /
translated: “Even if the major and minor body parts are cut off, who is cutting, and what is being cut?

original: lus ni su'i lus /🔽tshor ba ni su'i tshor ba /
analyzed: lus ni su'i lus / tshor ba ni su'i tshor ba /
translated: Whose body is this?🔽Whose feeling is this?

original: 'du shes ni su'i 'du shes /
analyzed: 'du shes ni su'i 'du shes /
translated: Whose perception is this?

original: 'du byed ni su'i 'du byed /
analyzed: 'du byed ni su'i 'du byed /
translated: Whose volitional factors are these?

original: rnam par shes pa ni su'i rnam par shes pa snyam ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni su'i rnam par shes pa snyam ste /
translated: Whose consciousness is this?”

original: de de ltar so sor rtog pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: de de ltar so sor rtog pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste /
translated: When he investigates in this way, he thinks:

original: gang la spyo ba dang / kyal ba byas na gnod sems skye ba de lta bu'i gshe ba'ang gang zhig yod /
analyzed: gang la spyo ba dang / kyal ba byas na gnod sems skye ba de lta bu'i gshe ba'ang gang zhig yod /
translated: “What is there to be angry about, and what is there to be irritated about?

original: 'khyal ba'ang gang zhig yod snyam ste /
analyzed: 'khyal ba'ang gang zhig yod snyam ste /
translated: What is there to be contemptuous about?”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Subhūti, in this way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to ////
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to ////
translated: take hold of the perfection of patience.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa /
translated: Fascicle Forty-Eight🔽“Subhūti, in what way do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom take hold of the perfection of concentration?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings, while abiding in the perfection of concentration,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: take hold of the perfection of perseverance?”

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' @124a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' @124a *//
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings,

original: sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: while abiding in the perfection of concentration,

original: 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: 'dod pas dben /
translated: are free from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: free from negative and non-virtuous factors,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: and endowed with ideation and scrutiny.

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas so //
translated: They establish and maintain the first meditative concentration, which is free from ideation and scrutiny, and is born of the concentration of the mind’s one-pointed focus on a single object.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas /
translated: They pacify ideation and scrutiny,

original: nang yongs su dang ste /🔽sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: nang yongs su dang ste / sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /
translated: and their inner mind becomes clear.

original: dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa med pa /
translated: With a single mental continuum, they are free from ideation and scrutiny,🔽and are endowed with the joy and bliss born of meditative concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the second concentration, which is free from the investigation and analysis that are the cause of distraction and is accompanied by the joy and pleasure born of concentration.🔽

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /🔽shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
translated: He attains and dwells in the second concentration, which is free of thought and investigation, and is born of samādhi, and is filled with the joy and bliss of singleness of mind.

original: bde ba lus kyis myong la /
analyzed: bde ba lus kyis myong la /
translated: “He, being free of desire for joy, dwells with mindfulness and alertness, and experiences physical bliss.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: “The noble ones declare: ‘He is mindful, and dwells in bliss, experiencing physical bliss.’

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “He attains and dwells in the third concentration, which is without joy.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
translated: “He gives up pleasure, gives up pain,

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /🔽bde ba'ang med /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas / bde ba'ang med /
translated: and with the disappearance of mental well-being and unease,

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te /
translated: he attains and dwells in the fourth concentration, which is without pleasure or pain, and is purified in terms of mindfulness.🔽“He attains and dwells in the sphere of infinite space.

original: de bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin @124b to; ;de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed de /
analyzed: de bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin @124b to; ;de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed de /
translated: With a mind thus concentrated, he experiences manifold supernormal powers:

original: des chen po 'di'ang rab tu g-yo bar byed do //🔽gcig tu gyur cing mang po 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des chen po 'di'ang rab tu g-yo bar byed do // gcig tu gyur cing mang po 'gyur ro //
translated: he shakes this very earth;🔽he becomes one and then many;

original: mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: he becomes many and then one;

original: snang ba dang / mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do //🔽rtsig pa las thal ba dang / rab las thal ba dang / ri las thal ba thogs pa med par 'gro ste /
analyzed: snang ba dang / mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do // rtsig pa las thal ba dang / rab las thal ba dang / ri las thal ba thogs pa med par 'gro ste /
translated: he appears and disappears;

original: dper na / nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no //🔽nam mkha' la'ang 'gro ste /🔽dper na / 'dab chags bya bzhin no //🔽sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed de /🔽dper na / chu la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no // nam mkha' la'ang 'gro ste / dper na / 'dab chags bya bzhin no // sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed de / dper na / chu la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: he goes unhindered through walls, through enclosures, through mountains, as though in open space;🔽he dives in and out of the earth as though in water;

original: chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste /
analyzed: chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste /
translated: he goes on water without breaking through as though on earth;🔽he flies cross-legged through the sky like a bird;

original: dper na / sa la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / sa la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the earth.

original: du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar bar byed de /
analyzed: du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar bar byed de /
translated: It emits smoke and flames.

original: dper na / me'i phung po chen po bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / me'i phung po chen po bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a great mass of fire.

original: nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing /
analyzed: nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing /
translated: The sun and moon are so powerful and majestic,

original: dbang che ba de dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro //🔽de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
analyzed: dbang che ba de dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro // de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
translated: and yet he touches them with his hand and controls them with his body up to the Brahma world.

original: lha dang / mi'i sgra nye 'am /
analyzed: lha dang / mi'i sgra nye 'am /
translated: With his pure divine ear, which surpasses the human ear,

original: ring yang rung ste thos so //🔽de sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du @125a *//
analyzed: ring yang rung ste thos so // de sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du @125a *//
translated: he hears both far and near,🔽the sounds of gods and humans.🔽He knows the minds of other beings and other persons,🔽knowing them as they really are.🔽He knows a mind with passion as a mind with passion,

original: rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rab tu shes so //
translated: and he knows a mind without passion as a mind without passion.

original: bla na med pa'i sems kyi bar la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sems kyi bar la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: up to the unsurpassed mind, he knows as it really is that it is the unsurpassed mind.🔽He recollects his manifold previous abodes, with their aspects and particulars, recollecting one lifetime as if it were yesterday, up to recollecting a hundred thousand lifetimes.

original: de ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no //🔽bskal pa gcig gi bar du rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no //
analyzed: de ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no // bskal pa gcig gi bar du rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no //
translated: He recollects one eon as if it were yesterday, up to recollecting a hundred thousand eons.🔽He recollects a hundred thousand eons of the formation of the world, a hundred thousand eons of the destruction of the world, and a hundred thousand eons of both the formation and destruction of the world.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang rjes su dran te /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang rjes su dran te /
translated: He recollects many hundreds of thousands of eons of the formation of the world, many hundreds of thousands of eons of the destruction of the world, and many hundreds of thousands of eons of both the formation and destruction of the world.

original: bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste /
analyzed: bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste /
translated: He recollects: ‘I was born in such and such a place,

original: ming ni 'di zhes bya /🔽rus ni 'di zhes bya /🔽rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
analyzed: ming ni 'di zhes bya / rus ni 'di zhes bya / rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
translated: had such and such a name,🔽belonged to such and such a family,

original: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za /🔽yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug /
analyzed: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za / yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug /
translated: ate such and such food,🔽experienced such and such happiness and suffering,🔽lived for so long,

original: tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te /
analyzed: tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te /
translated: and after such and such a length of time, I died and was reborn in such and such a place, and after that I died and was reborn here.’

original: de ltar bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ltar bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Thus, After dying here, I was born there.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas /🔽gtan tshigs dang bcas /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas / gtan tshigs dang bcas /
translated: In this way, he recollects his own and others' past lives in their various aspects, saying: In such and such a place, I had this and that name, this and that family, this and that caste, this and that color, this and that food, this and that experience of pleasure and pain, this and that life span. When I passed away from there, I was reborn elsewhere. When I passed away from there, I was reborn here.🔽He recollects in their various aspects,🔽with their characteristics and with their causes,

original: dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran no //🔽de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
analyzed: dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran no // de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
translated: his own and others' past lives in their many forms.

original: sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba nas sems can rnams las bzhin du 'gro ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba nas sems can rnams las bzhin du 'gro ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: With his divine eye, which is purified and surpasses the human, he sees beings dying and being born and perceives how they go to good or bad destinies according to their deeds.

original: de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas nas /
analyzed: de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in these five superknowledges,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan @125b 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan @125b 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield in order to serve the lord buddhas, to ask questions and make requests, to accumulate roots of virtue, to ripen beings, and to purify a buddhafield.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: They do not dedicate those roots of virtue to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i /
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level.

original: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: Instead, they make common cause with all sentient beings and

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ci nas kyang gang yongs su bsngo ba dang / ci yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang gang yongs su bsngo ba dang / ci yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate them in such a way that the three thoughts do not occur: what is being dedicated, to what it is being dedicated, and by whom it is being dedicated.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being standing in the perfection of concentration seizes the perfection of perseverance.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Lord,
