original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration seize the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: gzugs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs mi dmigs so //
translated: do not apprehend form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs @126a */
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs @126a */
translated: They do not apprehend feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: ;so; ;mig mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ;so; ;mig mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the eyes.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the ears, nose, tongue, body, or thinking mind.

original: gzugs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend a form.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang; chos mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang; chos mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend sound, smell, taste, tangibles, or mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the eye consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to he does not apprehend the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend eye contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to he does not apprehend mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend feelings that arise from the condition of eye contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to he does not apprehend feelings that arise from the condition of mind contact.

original: sa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the earth element,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to he does not apprehend the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend ignorance,

original: rga shi'i bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to he does not apprehend old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are non-apprehensible,

original: nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: the applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags @126b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags @126b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and the eightfold noble path are non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors to liberation, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //
translated: the great love, the great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The compounded element is non-apprehensible,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams mi dmigs so; ;de ltar mi dmigs pas na mngon par 'du mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams mi dmigs so; ;de ltar mi dmigs pas na mngon par 'du mi byed do //
translated: and the unconditioned element is not apprehended.🔽Since they are not apprehended, they do not form.

original: mngon par 'du mi byed pas na skye ba'am 'gag pa mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed pas na skye ba'am 'gag pa mi byed do //
translated: Since they do not form, they do not give rise to or cause the cessation of anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /🔽ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is because whether Tathāgatas arise or do not arise🔽the real nature of dharmas,🔽the dharma-constituent,

original: chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gnas pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gnas pa ste /
translated: the establishment of dharmas,🔽the certification of dharmas,🔽the dharma-element,🔽and the very limit of reality remain just as they are.

original: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir de mi skye mi 'gag pas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir de mi skye mi 'gag pas /
translated: They are not produced and do not cease,

original: de g-yeng ba med pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin te /
analyzed: de g-yeng ba med pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin te /
translated: and so they are not distracted from the attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam @127a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam @127a *//
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: take hold of the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of concentration

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: take hold of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: and take up the perfection of generosity?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Su­bhūti, this is how it is.

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: they see that all phenomena are empty.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings, when they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba lags /
translated: see that all phenomena are empty?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Su­bhūti,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che /🔽nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che / nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so // phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhuti: Here a Bodhisattva, who courses in perfect wisdom, does not apprehend the inner emptiness as the inner emptiness,🔽does not apprehend the outer emptiness as the outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend the inner and outer emptiness as the inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend the emptiness of emptiness as the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend the great emptiness as the great emptiness,

original: @127b don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @127b don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend the ultimate emptiness as the ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend the emptiness of conditioned coproduction as the emptiness of conditioned coproduction,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not apprehended as the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not apprehended as the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not apprehended as the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of nature is not apprehended as the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs te //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs te //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is not apprehended as the emptiness of its own mark.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas shing /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings abide in those fourteen kinds of emptiness.

original: gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings stand in those fourteen kinds of emptiness and do not apprehend form as empty or not empty.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as empty or not empty.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya ba'am stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya ba'am stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination as empty or not empty.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong zhes bya ba'am mi @128a *//🔽stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong zhes bya ba'am mi @128a *//🔽stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the perfections, thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,🔽or ten powers of a tathāgata as empty or not empty.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, and the nine serial absorptions as empty or not empty.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness as empty or not empty.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so; ;stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so; ;bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so; ;stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so; ;bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue, the sensory element of tastes, and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness as existent or nonexistent.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangibles, and the sensory element of tactile consciousness as existent or nonexistent.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs te /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs te / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing /
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness as existent or nonexistent.🔽They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the eyes, the sensory element of sights, and the sensory element of visual consciousness as existent or nonexistent.🔽They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears, the sensory element of sounds, and the sensory element of auditory consciousness as existent or nonexistent.🔽They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the nose, the sensory element of odors, and the sensory element of olfactory consciousness as existent or nonexistent.

original: zas sam / skom mam /
analyzed: zas sam / skom mam /
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue, the sensory element of tastes, and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness as existent or nonexistent.🔽They do not apprehend the emptiness of the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangibles, and the sensory element of tactile

original: bzhon pa'am / gos sam /
analyzed: bzhon pa'am / gos sam /
translated: clothes, or

original: me tog gam /🔽phreng ba'am / spos sam /
analyzed: me tog gam / phreng ba'am / spos sam /
translated: flowers, or🔽garlands, or incense, or

original: byug pa'am / mal cha'am /🔽gnas sam / 'tsho ba'am /
analyzed: byug pa'am / mal cha'am / gnas sam / 'tsho ba'am /
translated: ointments, or beds, or

original: yo byad dam /
analyzed: yo byad dam /
translated: lodgings, or life necessities, or

original: mi'i @128b yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i sbyin pa gang dang gang gtong yang des sbyin pa de'ang stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽gang yongs su gtong ba dang / gang la yongs su gtong ba de'ang stong zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi'i @128b yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i sbyin pa gang dang gang gtong yang des sbyin pa de'ang stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gang yongs su gtong ba dang / gang la yongs su gtong ba de'ang stong zhes bya ba'am /
translated: any human necessities whatsoever, he does not see that gift as empty.🔽He does not see that which is given, or that to which it is given, as empty or

original: mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽de la 'jungs pa'i sems sam /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / de la 'jungs pa'i sems sam /
translated: not empty.🔽There is no opportunity for a stingy mind or

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems kyi skabs med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems kyi skabs med do //
translated: a grasping mind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽For a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom, from the

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: time of the first production of the thought of awakening onward,

original: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med de /
analyzed: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med de /
translated: until they are seated at the site of awakening, all those conceptual thoughts are absent.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam /
translated: Just as the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas, who have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, are devoid of a miserly mind or a grasping mind,

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'i thugs mi mnga' ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang 'jungs pa'i sems sam /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'i thugs mi mnga' ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang 'jungs pa'i sems sam /
translated: so too, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they are devoid of a miserly mind or a grasping mind.

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems skye ba med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems skye ba med do //
translated: “There is no miserly mind or grasping mind that arises in them.

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ston pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ston pa'o //
translated: It is because this transcendent perfection of wisdom is the teacher of great bodhisattva beings.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings, abiding in the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: they embrace the transcendent perfection of generosity.

original: @129a *// gsol pa /
analyzed: @129a *// gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the transcendent perfection of wisdom

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: embrace the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings standing in the transcendent perfection of wisdom

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i go skabs mi 'byed do //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i go skabs mi 'byed do //
translated: do not open the way for the levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar des nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar des nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: Because they do not apprehend the levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: sems de'ang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sems de'ang mi dmigs te /
translated: and they do not apprehend the mind.

original: de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: From the time they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment,

original: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin /
analyzed: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin /
translated: Until I sit on the seat of awakening, I will give up killing.

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
translated: I will encourage others to give up killing.

original: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up killing.

original: gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spang ba yang dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spang ba yang dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of others giving up killing, welcoming it.

original: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zha gcod pa'i tshig dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spangs pa yin /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zha gcod pa'i tshig dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spangs pa yin /
translated: I will give up stealing, sexual misconduct, lying, slander, harsh speech, gossip, covetousness, ill will, and wrong views.

original: gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin /
translated: I will encourage others to give up wrong views.

original: log par lta ba spong @129b ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: log par lta ba spong @129b ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up wrong views.

original: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pa'i dga' bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pa'i dga' bar byed pa yin te /
translated: and they will praise those others who have given up wrong views and will themselves rejoice in that.

original: tshul khrims des nyan thos sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims des nyan thos sam /
translated: Through that morality they will not be attached to any śrāvaka or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur na /
translated: pratyekabuddha Dharma,

original: gzhan man chad lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan man chad lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone to any other.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom incorporate the perfection of morality.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti asked him,
